item.title: CVE-2024-27193|2024-08-02T00:27:59.757Z -- payu -- payu%20india
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in PayU PayU India allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects PayU India: from n/a through 3.8.2.
